SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が持[も]ってきた漫[まん]画[が]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The manga you brought me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: くれた知[し]らない名[なま]前[え]のお花[はな]
SongLyrics.EngStr: An unknown flower you gave me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今日[きょう]はまだ来[き]ないかな?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Aren't you coming here today?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 初[はじ]めての感[かん]情[じょう]知[し]ってしまった
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's my first time experiencing this feeling

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 窓[まど]に飾[かざ]った絵[かい]画[が]をなぞってひとりで宇[う]宙[ちゅう]を旅[たび]して
SongLyrics.EngStr: Tracing along the paintings by the window, I traveled through space alone

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それだけでいいはずだったのに
SongLyrics.EngStr: That should've been all I needed.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の手[て]を握[にぎ]ってしまったら
SongLyrics.EngStr: If I held your hand

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 孤[こ]独[どく]を知[し]らないこの街[まち]には
SongLyrics.EngStr: To the town which doesn't know loneliness

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もう二[に]度[ど]と帰[かえ]ってくることはできないのでしょう
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'd never be able to return again

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が手[て]を差[さ]し伸[の]べた 光[ひかり]で影[かげ]が生[う]まれる
SongLyrics.EngStr: You held out your hand to me, the light creates shadows

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 歌[うた]って聞[き]かせて この話[はなし]の続[つづ]き
SongLyrics.EngStr: Sing for me and tell me the rest of the story

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 連[つ]れて行[い]って見[み]たことない星[ほし]まで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Take me along to a star I've never seen before

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]の手[て]も声[こえ]も届[とど]かない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Where nobody can hear or touch

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 高[たか]く聳[そび]え立[た]った塔[とう]の上[うえ]へ
SongLyrics.EngStr: At the top of the soaring tower

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 飛[と]ばすフウセンカズラ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll let some balloon vines fly

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]は君[きみ]に笑[わら]って欲[ほ]しいんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Because I want you to laugh

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 満[み]たされない穴[あな]は惰[だ]性[せい]の会[かい]話[わ]や澄[す]ましたポーズで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Up until now, I've filled in the gaping holes

SongLyrics.JpnStr: これまでは埋[う]めてきたけど
SongLyrics.EngStr: With dragging conversations and prim posture

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 退[たい]屈[くつ]な日[ひ]々[び]を蹴[け]散[ち]らして
SongLyrics.EngStr: If I cast away the boring days

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]と二[ふた]人[り]でこの街[まち]中[じゅう]を泳[およ]げたら
SongLyrics.EngStr: And swam with you all over the city

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それはどれだけ素敵[すてき]なことでしょう?
SongLyrics.EngStr: How wonderful would it be?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 出[だ]したことないほど大[おお]きな声[こえ]でやっと君[きみ]に伝[つた]わる
SongLyrics.EngStr: With the voice much louder than I've ever spoken, I can finally get through to you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 歪[いびつ]なくらいがさ きっとちょうどいいね
SongLyrics.EngStr: Something distorted will be better for now

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 世[せ]界[かい]の端[はし]と端[はし]を結[むす]んで

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それだけでも不[ふ]自[じ]由[ゆう]ないけど
SongLyrics.EngStr: That just was enough before, though

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]は選[えら]んでみたいの

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 高[たか]鳴[な]る心[こころ] 謎[なぞ]だらけの空[そら]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to pick them out

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 安[あん]全[ぜん]なループを今[いま]、書[か]き換[か]えて!
